extendedInfo.description: Leaving this at free until I can resolve some of the problems being reported.CastleGuard2 is a 3D Action RPG demo from developer Dave Young, built using Shiva. It is a small sample of great things to come, with expanded skills, inventory, quests, story, and maps.

reviews.comment: Like said, buggy, but awesome potential. Great graphics, neat interface, cool action. Cant wait for more!!!!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Main menu ctrls (help,etc) other than 3D of game dont work. Controls near impossible. Has potential (3D, rpg stndpts) but not close to there yet. Unin
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: As has been said, this is a **3D** engine for an RPG! Much work to be done, but GREAT potential. Great job so far, guys ;)
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Cache files show up in music. Lame. Dev should read android dev guides so they can save those files where they wont be added to music.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: locked up phone, had to remove battery - Moto Droid-Does
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Tons of potential! Runs smoothly, but cant apply a name and theres no NPC interaction. I look forward to an update! Moto Droid
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: It is a prertty good game but i have a few suggestions add a toggle button to chest and doors make to where you can pick up arrows and then could you
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: I really enjoyed playing this game although it didn\'t have much content. I follow a lot of RPG\'s including the big time MMO\'s. Keep working on it.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: I want to play this SO BAD but it doesn\'t function fully on droid x. Graphics are super-smooth, but features are quirky.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Needs a lot of work. Maybe keyboard controls for droid? More interaction with people. I\'d really like to see this completed.

reviews.comment: Great try needs work when its fixed ill rate 5 stars

reviews.comment: pretty cool but how do you save progress? And how do I use the sword? I can only use the bow and arrow...

reviews.comment: Good work. Graphics are awesome. Some people cant read that its a buggy demo, and that a LOT of work goes into making this.
